ARABIC: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَأَنَّهُۥ يُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَأَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is because Allah is the Real and gives life to the dead and has power over all things
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That is so for God is the undeniable Reality. It is He who brings the dead to life, for He has power over everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: All this is because Allah, He is the Truth, and because He resurrects the dead, and because He has power over everything,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is because God is the Supreme Truth who gives life to the dead and who has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is because Allah only is True and because He will revive the dead, and because He is Able to do all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That is because Allah: He is the Truth, and it is He Who gives life to the dead, and it is He Who is able to do all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is because Allah is the Truth and because He gives life to the dead and because He has power over all things
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: That is because God -- He is the Truth, and brings the dead to life, and is powerful over everything,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That is because Allah, He is the Truth and because He quickeneth the dead, and because He is Able to do all things;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that is because God is the truth. It is He who gives life to the dead and He has the power to will anything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That, because Allah! He is The Truth, and He quickeneth the dead, and verily He is over everything Potent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: All that is because Allah is the Reality and it is He who revives the dead, and He has power over all things,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This is so, because Allah is the Reality: it is He Who gives life to the dead, and it is He Who has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That is because Allah, He is the Truth, and it is He Who gives life to the dead, and it is He Who is Able to do all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: That is because Allah is the Truth; He revives the dead and has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: That is because God is the truth, and because He gives life to the dead, and because He is Capable of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That is because Allah is the Truth and because He gives life to the dead and because He is over all things competent
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [22:6] That, which is mentioned, from the commencement of man’s creation to the end of [the description of] the   earth being revived, is because God, He is the Truth, the Constant, the Permanent, and because He revives the dead and has power over all things;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That is because) the power to transform you, and to do other things, so that you acknowledge and know that (Allah, He is the Truth) the worship of Allah is the Truth. (Lo! He quickeneth the dead) for the resurrection, (and lo! He is Able to do all things) of life and death;
